title: Our Year End Review
description: The hosts reflect on the rapid advancements in AI technology over the past year, covering implications for business, human interaction, AI alignment, agent roles, and local AI solutions.
keyTakeaways: 2025 saw unprecedented advancements in AI capabilities.
AI alignment remains a critical concern as models become more powerful.
Agents are becoming increasingly important in AI workflows.
Local AI solutions offer privacy and control benefits.
The intersection of AI and business continues to evolve rapidly.
